biotools.summary: Designs large sets of universal primers when provided with a gene reference ID or FASTA sequence. This tool works by integrating Blastn, T-Coffee, GramAlign and Primer3 into a single software pipeline.

bioschemas.name: UniPrime2
bioschemas.summary: Designs large sets of universal primers when provided with a gene reference ID or FASTA sequence. This tool works by integrating Blastn, T-Coffee, GramAlign and Primer3 into a single software pipeline.
